Load Companion: Revolutionize Your Trucking Dispatch Operations

Transform your trucking operations with Load Companion, the ultimate Google Chrome extension designed specifically for trucking carriers and dispatchers. Streamline your workflow with one-click emails and advanced customization, seamlessly integrated with top load boards Power DAT and DAT One, Sylectus, more load boards coming soon.

üöÄ One-Click Email Magic:
Send booking requests effortlessly with just a single click directly from DAT.com. Whether using Gmail or Outlook, our seamless integration lets you communicate faster than ever in the trucking industry.

‚úèÔ∏è Advanced Email Editor:
Customize your emails on-the-fly with our sophisticated built-in editor. Make last-minute adjustments without ever leaving your dashboard, ensuring your trucking communications are always precise and on point.

üîç Customizable Load Searching:
Tailor your search with custom filters to quickly find exactly the loads you need. Spend less time searching and more time hauling in the trucking sector.

üìä Instant RPM Calculator:
Stay ahead of the curve by knowing your numbers at a glance. Calculate rates per mile in an instant and make informed decisions swiftly. Our RPM calculator integrates directly into your workflow, displayed prominently on the DAT Power board.

üìà RPM Column:
View real-time rates per mile directly on your board for quick and effective decision-making. 

‚öôÔ∏è Quick and Easy Setup:
Get started with Load Companion in less than a minute! Our quick setup process will have you up and running immediately, enhancing your productivity without any hassle.

Why Choose Load Companion?

- Speed Up Your Trucking Operations: React to loads up to 10x faster and streamline your booking process with unparalleled efficiency.
- Experience Immediate Benefits: See the value Load Companion brings to your trucking operations within just one minute of installation!
